attributes.review: This app is good for what it is: a political campaign contact tool. It has a few bugs (and I've sent feedback). But it seems to do an okay job linking for contacts/invites, current campaign info and videos, and linking to campaign website.
attributes.title: Good for what it is

attributes.review: This is a great app - quick access to get updates on the campaign, news & activities. Fun things to do too.üòä
attributes.title: Very Excited!

attributes.review: The app appears to work smooth as silk and is a great opportunity to track the race and feel connected to our next president.
attributes.title: Looks like fun!

attributes.review: The lay out and functionality is as intuitive as can be. I can only assume that this app is under budget and ahead of schedule!
attributes.userName: this pea just poped the pod
attributes.title: MAGA

attributes.review: Trump may be the only candidate you see in your lifetime that isn't controlled by mass media. Make the right choice. A vote for Hillary is a vote thrown in the trash. Vote Trump to Make America Great Again.
attributes.title: Honest opinion

attributes.review: Love this app!  Accurate Information from the source! Interactive and easy to find supporters all over, especially in your own state.
attributes.title: MAGA!

attributes.review: I love getting the latest updates on my phone and following everything that's going on with the election.
attributes.title: Great app

attributes.review:
This app is where it's really at if you need to know about what's definitely going on.
Feel the high energy!
attributes.title: The Power of Truth

attributes.review: Absolutely my new favorite app! Put together well and anything relating to this years election can be found within this app. Lots of fun also!! üëçüèª
attributes.title: Great App!!

attributes.review: This App is the most patriotic app anyone could get. It's designed well and is easy to navigate throughout the app. If you want to MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN, then you should download this app ASAP! üá∫üá∏
attributes.title: Great App!!
